subject: Simsonn Clutch pedal stopped working
description_text:
Hello and happy new years! I’m just sending a email regarding my clutch pedal. It just stopped working randomly, everything seems to be intact, no wires disconnected, I can press it in. It’s just not getting an input in the software I guess. I haven’t had the pedals for to long and I honestly love them. Wondering if you guys know a fix or the problem! Thanks again!

Here’s my order number if it helps - SSN1958

conversations.body_text: Hi Greyson Nye,  If testing the Offset function does not resolve the issue, we will send you a replacement clutch load cell sensor for you to install and test. In addition, please check whether any clutch components are damaged or if the spring is missing.
